import React from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import axios from '../../axios-orders'; function SelectionFrom({route, value}) { const postDataHandler = () => { console.log('was clicked'); const booking = { routePicked: route, numOfKayaks: '2', date: value, } axios.post('/bookings.json', booking) .then(response => console.log(response)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

{route} on {value.format("DD")} of {value.format("MMMM")}

 Name Number of Kayaks Start Time {/* */}
) } export default SelectionFrom;
